meanings.sent1: The fruiting of the apple tree is a beautiful sight in the orchard.
meanings.sent2: The farmer eagerly awaited the fruiting of his tomato plants.
meanings.sent3: The fruiting of the peach tree brought joy to the entire garden.
meanings.sent4: The fruiting of her hard work was finally evident in the successful harvest.
meanings.sent5: The fruiting of the vineyard signaled a bountiful season ahead.

meanings.sent1: The fruiting of the cherry tree delighted the children in the park.
meanings.sent2: The fruiting of the pear tree was a sign of a good growing season.
meanings.sent3: The fruiting of the orange tree made the gardener proud of his care.
meanings.sent4: The fruiting of her efforts was evident in the delicious apples on the tree.
meanings.sent5: The fruiting of the plum tree was a testament to nature's abundance.

meanings.sent1: The fruiting of the strawberry plant was a gradual process.
meanings.sent2: The fruiting of the watermelon vine was a result of careful nurturing.
meanings.sent3: The fruiting of the lemon tree surprised the gardener with its speed.
meanings.sent4: The fruiting of the mango tree was a colorful display of nature's artistry.
meanings.sent5: The fruiting of the grapevine promised a sweet reward for the winemaker.

meanings.definition: The result or outcome of an action or process.
meanings.sent1: The fruiting of their collaboration was a successful product launch.
meanings.sent2: The fruiting of her dedication was a promotion at work.
meanings.sent3: The fruiting of their teamwork led to a memorable event.
meanings.sent4: The fruiting of his creativity was a masterpiece admired by all.
meanings.sent5: The fruiting of their friendship was a bond that grew stronger over time.
